resources.string: Let peoplee know if there is really food here or not

The purpose of this app is to allow users to know where free food is being served on a college campus near them. I randomly thought of it one day and was surprised to find that no one else had already made it, so I went ahead and made it. If you have any questions, comments, suggestions, etc. send me an email at grothedev@gmail.com. 
 
Source code: https://github.com/grothedev/freepizza-android 
API source and spec: https://github.com/grothedev/freepizza-api
